channel.title: stringr on Exploring Data
channel.description: Recent content in stringr on Exploring Data

item.title: Advanced Plots with str_glue()
item.description: Source: https://bit.ly/2CGyS6I Enter your Email Here to get the latest from Exploring-Data in your inbox. Let’s Dive Into an Example I’d like to share a technique using str_glue() that I learned from Matt Dancho, a Data-Science instructor at Business Science University. Check out my favorite course here: Business Analysis With R. str_glue() from the stringr library is one of my favorite functions in R - It’s super helpful for wrangling and manipulating text in preparation for building advanced plots.
